conversations.content: Bob shared some discounts via email. Please check the SSD I bought today and see if Bob's discount would have been cheaper. If so, refund my purchase and rebuy it using his discount.

<function_thought>
The user wants to check if a discount shared by Bob in an email would have made their SSD purchase cheaper. If so, they want the original purchase refunded and the item repurchased using Bob's discount.

The first step is to check the unread emails linked to the shopping account to find the email from Bob containing the discount information. This will allow us to retrieve the discount details.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_shopping_linked_unread_emails()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
